meanings: (부친) father, (아빠) (informal) dad, (Am, inf) pop, (slng) one's old man
be severely scolded by one´s father

vlive.korean: 아버지께서 저를 데리고 콘서트를... and he took me to a concert... 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 산이의 소소한 일상🥰
vlive.english: and he took me to a concert...

examples.korean: The bride was given away by her father. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 신부는 아버지가 신랑에게 인도했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bride was given away by her father. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He refused to admit paternity of the child. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 아이의 아버지라는 것을 인정하지 않으려 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He refused to admit paternity of the child. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My father resigned his directorship last year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 아버지께서는 작년에 이사직에서 물러나셨다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My father resigned his directorship last year. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He spoke feelingly about his dead father. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 돌아가신 자기 아버지에 대해 감정에 겨워하며 말을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He spoke feelingly about his dead father. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The present duke inherited the title from his father. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 현 공작은 아버지로부터 그 작위를 물려받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The present duke inherited the title from his father. Add to Wordbook
